overview: Two outwardly kindly farmers punish wandering sinners by feeding them to hideous demons they keep locked up in the barn. A mischievous hitchhiker is playing some malevolent road games. When a group of notorious criminals seek refuge in Pa and Nan's barn, they unleash a force of evil powerful enough to destroy a small town.
tagline: The Town of Angel Falls is Quite Hospitable to the Right Kind of People
title: The Evil Offspring
